location: Beitou District, Donghua Street Section 2, Lane 300, 82m from MRT Qiyan Station
notes: Large 4BR/2BA whole-floor unit in elevator building with 3 balconies and three-sided natural light. Comes fully furnished with appliances and includes parking. Baby safety considerations: multiple balconies require checking railing heights/gaps; 2-year minimum lease and no pets policy. Management fee of NT$9,500 adds significantly to monthly cost (total ~NT$89,500).
